name: Bear Fishing
description:
Welcome to Bear Fishing! The first VR-ready Gummy Bear Survival Simulation!  Complete with motion controller support and sweet & sassy fish waiting to jump down the gullet of your cubs.

Do you have what it takes to put those fish in their place and keep your cubs alive?! 

Download and find out for yourself in this daring space espionage survival crafting wilderness adventure!

Composed over the course of 4 long days by JPat Cooley, Marty Rabens, and Ryan Darge
